venues.name: The Spa at The Little Nell
venues.review: At the base of Ajax mountain in the most expensive zip code in Colorado. The hydrothermal suite — hot tub, sauna, steam, cold plunge — is what you want after a hard day of powder. The altitude-specific treatments are thoughtfully designed and genuinely effective at 8,000 feet.

venues.name: The Spa at The St. Regis Aspen
venues.review: The St. Regis spa in Aspen delivers what you come to Aspen for — exceptional everything, in a mountain setting, without visible effort. The heated outdoor pool in winter with snowflakes falling is one of the genuinely great spa moments you can have in the American West.
